title.rendered: Michael E. Goings’ ‘Seed of Simon’ Billboard Extravaganza Takes Brooklyn by Storm

content.rendered:
“Elevating Imagination: The towering allure of Michael E. Goings’ ‘Seed of Simon’ beckons, inviting you to embark on an extraordinary literary journey.”

“An Epic Unveiling: Michael E. Goings’ ‘Seed of Simon’ Billboards Illuminate Brooklyn’s Literary Landscape.”

DILLON, SOUTH CAROLINA, UNITED STATES, December 5, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — — Esteemed author and historian Michael E. Goings is set to captivate the literary landscape with his latest masterpiece, “Seed of Simon.” A luminary with over four decades of dedication to roles as a pastor and noted author, Goings, an alumnus of the American International College and a three-year Army veteran, brings a wealth of experience to his latest creation.

In celebration of the book’s release, Michael E. Goings has unveiled a striking billboard campaign across five carefully chosen locations in Brooklyn, New York. The visually stunning billboards are strategically positioned at:

– Ocean Avenue, between Avenue Y & Avenue Z

– Tillary Street, between Court Street & Cadman Plaza

– New York Avenue, between 94 E & 95 E

– 86th Street, between 13th Avenue & 14th Avenue

– Pennsylvania Avenue, between Sutter Avenue & Blake Avenue

Each location serves as a canvas for the impactful visuals and messages inspired by “Seed of Simon,” creating a citywide celebration of faith, history, and the enduring human spirit.

Reflecting on the inspiration behind “Seed of Simon,” Goings shared, “This book is a testament to the intertwining of faith, history, and the enduring spirit of individuals connected to a larger narrative. I am eager to share this story with readers who appreciate the richness of our collective heritage.”

“Seed of Simon” delves into the poignant narrative of Rafael Smith, a young African-American man intricately linked to the historical lineage of Simon of Cyrene, compelled to carry the cross of Jesus. The novel explores the profound connections between faith, history, and the enduring spirit of individuals within a larger, collective heritage.

The billboard campaign serves as a visual testament to the power and significance of “Seed of Simon.” Michael E. Goings invites the community and beyond to engage with this thought-provoking work, inviting readers to explore the rich tapestry of faith and history woven into the narrative.

To learn more about Michael E. Goings and explore his inspiring journey and literary works, visit his official website at www.michaelgoings.com.

For those eager to delve into the world of “Seed of Simon,” the book is available for purchase on Amazon.

https://www.amazon.com/Seed-Simon-Michael-Goings-ebook/dp/B0BT3S7X77

Michael Goings
Glasslink Solutions
+1 (833) 201-1300
email us here

Radio Interview with Ric Bratton

You just read:

News Provided By

December 05, 2023, 23:11 GMT
